mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lyrics from song "Show Me the Way to Go Home" [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Show me the way to go home I'm tired and I wanna go to bed I had a little drink about an hour ago And it's gone straight to my head
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Drinking songs
Songs--Texts
